Question
========

Of 40 first-year nursing students, gender and age determined. This produced the following cross tabulation:

  ------- ------------------- -------------- ------------------ ---- 30 years and younger 31 - 40 years 41 years and older woman 15 10 3 28 male 5 5 2 12 20 15 5 40 ------- ------------------- -------------- ------------------ ----

The probability, that the person is male and/or has an age between 31 and 40 is

Answerlist
----------

* 0.125
* 0.3
* 0.55
* 0.675

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.125: Incorrect
* 0.3: Incorrect
* 0.55: Correct
* 0.675: Incorrect
